som::map::map ( unsigned  map_size,
unsigned  sample_size,
const boost::shared_ptr< som::abstract_distance > &  distance 
)

Map constructor.

Parameters:
map_sizeMatrix size (the map has all the nodes organized as a matrix)
sample_sizeSize of the sample vector
distanceA reference to the distance functor used to determine the best mathing unit and its neighbours
See also:
abstract_distance, euclidean_distance

Member Function Documentation

som::position som::map::get_bmu ( boost::numeric::ublas::vector< double > &  sample)

Get best matching unit.

Returns the position of the closest node to the sample vector (in terms of distance, depending on what metric the map uses). By default the euclidean distance is used.

Parameters:
sampleThe sample vector
Returns:
A som::position representing the matrix indexes of the closest node
See also:
abstract_distance, euclidean_distance
